title: Beware of the Warmth
detail_text: <:th_ch0105/>It’s so warm~....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Fufu, You-chan, you look really relaxed<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Because so far we haven’t had a single day where we could say “Ah, today is a little cold” right? It gives me a sense of relief~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Ah! I forgot!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Waah!? W- w- w-, what is it!? What happened!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>I was going to remind you to not forget to put on a sunscreen, You-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Sunscreen? Isn’t it too early?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>It’s late though? Really, it’s better if you start using one from February. You have a beautiful skin, You-chan, so at least use one when you’re doing your high diving practices alright?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Beautiful huh, you’re making me blush. If Riko-chan says so, I’ll do it. But do I even have one?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Geez! I’ll bring mine tomorrow okay!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
